I'm at a hair salon to dye my hair.
What color are you changing it to?
It will be cute with my bangs.
Are your friends and family okay with your decision?
Is anybody with you at the salon?
By the way, how long is your hair?
I think wavy hair makes you look younger.
I thought straight hair makes you look much younger.
Should I straighten my hair or not?
Well, either way, I'm sure you'll look beautiful.
